articles.description: Despite the ongoing issues with COVID-19, Sony believes it will still launch its next-generation PlayStation 5 console this year.
articles.content: In its latest financial earnings presentation, Sony has explained that its hardware and software plans for the upcoming PlayStation 5 launch have been unaffected by the global COVID-19 pandemic. Sony has still not yet announced a specific PS5 release date, bu… [+2225 chars]

articles.description: Call of Duty Modern Warfare, which released in 2019, is among the most successful CoD titles ever. Scump, however, says it is also one of the worst ever.
articles.content: Call of Duty is, without a doubt, one of the most popular and successful franchises in gaming ever. Of course, given its highly dedicated fan base, Activision has published a new title every year since 2005. The 2019 entry in the series, Call of Duty Modern W… [+2009 chars]

articles.author: Paul Ducklin
articles.title: PrintDemon – patch this ancient Windows printer bug! - Naked Security
articles.description: Bugs can last a long time… even if you thought you removed them years ago.
articles.content:
This month’s Patch Tuesday fixes just came out in what we’re calling a “bumper update“.
Microsoft pushed out fixes for 111 different CVE-tagged vulnerabilities, 16 of which are deemed critical.
That includes bugs that could in theory be remotely exploited, … [+6942 chars]

articles.description: Remastered versions of the first two Tony Hawk's Pro Skater games are coming to PS4, Xbox One, and PC this September, and you can pre-order it now.
articles.content: The Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series inspires more nostalgia than most games of its era. It's been five years since the last THPS game, and Pro Skater 5 was seriously underwhelming. Well, Activision has heard the calls from fans and is set to release a remastere… [+2953 chars]
